allIssues.description: Ensures every ARIA input field has an accessible name
allIssues.help: ARIA input fields must have an accessible name
allIssues.summary:
Fix any of the following:
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
allIssues.source: <div class="slick-track" style="opacity: 1; width: 6440px; transform: translate3d(-1288px, 0px, 0px);" role="listbox">
allIssues.testPageTitle: American Red Cross | Help Those Affected by Disasters

allIssues.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
allIssues.help: Images must have alternate text
selector: div[aria-describedby="slick-slide00"] > .icon-card-main.padding-container > .container-flex > .icon.container-flex > .icon-link > a[data-aa-link-button="icon-card link button not set"] > .icon-image
allIssues.summary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an alt attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"
allIssues.testPageTitle: American Red Cross | Help Those Affected by Disasters

allIssues.description: Ensures select element has an accessible name
allIssues.help: Select element must have an accessible name
allIssues.summary:
Fix any of the following:
  Form element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>
  Form element does not have an explicit <label>
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"
allIssues.testPageTitle: American Red Cross | Help Those Affected by Disasters
